title: In captial letters 🎀
text:
"What is love?" they ask.
I simply say His name—in capital letters.


"How could someone so far matter to you this much?" they ask.
I say, he's far, yet the warmth of his love wraps me tighter than my favorite sweaters.


"What is it that you find so attractive in him?" they ask.
Is it his eyes, his smile, his voice?
Or the way he's never tired of saying how he feels for me?
The way he shows me, every day, how grateful he is to have me?
No single answer would suffice, because with him, it only gets better.

- Suvi

title: Feels like a dream come true!
text:
I saw a dream about you!
Should I think of it as a cue?
A cue which tells me that we should make it come true,
Yes, the dream which was all about you!

I saw myself melting in your arms,
Even if it was just a dream, I couldn't resist all your charms!

The eye contact which we had,
Spoke more than words, made me feel so glad! 

The moment when you held me,
To tell me how much you love me,
I was just about to look deep into your eyes and say,
That I felt the same in every way.

But as I said, it was just a dream,
Someone woke me up—it felt so mean!

Pulled away from a world so divine,
Where your heart felt perfectly aligned with mine.

If only dreams could turn to reality,
I'd find you and make this destiny.
The kind of destiny which won't have any borders,
Where love flows freely, crossing all orders.

No distance would feel too far, no time would feel too long,
With you by my side, my world would feel so strong.

Together, we'd shape a life so true,
Just like this dream, only me and you!

title: Open when you're traveling alone.
text:
If you’re reading this, it probably means you're on the move, maybe with those friends (your boyfriends), who take too many risks, or drag you into plans you didn’t fully think through. And maybe it's late. Maybe you're somewhere you promised you wouldn’t go. Maybe you're just trying to enjoy the moment but your mind is a little unsettled. Mine definitely is. 😏

I’m not here to scold or control you. I trust your heart. 🤧
But I also care about your safety in ways that make me worry even when I don’t want to. You matter too much to me not to say this...
Please be careful. Please stay alert.
Don’t follow the crowd just to avoid saying no. Your peace, your life, your well-being...they come first, always.

I know you’re strong and smart and capable, but even the strongest need reminders sometimes, so here we're - 

🔪 Keep your phone charged.

🔪 Stay close to people you actually trust.

🔪 If something doesn’t feel right, don’t second 
      guess it... Leave! 

🔪 And if you're tired, rest. You're not missing out on   
      anything worth more than your safety.

🔪 Stay away from women other than your gf (Suvi).


I may be far away, but that doesn’t stop me from thinking of you every moment. You're carrying a piece of my heart with you wherever you go. So carry it gently, okay? 🥺

Come back safe. Come back whole. Come back to me. 🥺😭
Always waiting, always loving.🥺🩷
Your suvi 🤧

title: Open when you're feeling unmotivated.
text:
It’s okay to feel like this. Everyone has those days, when nothing clicks, when the smallest tasks feel heavy, and when motivation seems to vanish. I know how strong and driven you usually are, so if you're feeling off right now, please don’t be too hard on yourself.

You’re allowed to rest. You’re allowed to slow down.
This moment doesn’t define you...it’s just a pause, not a full stop.

Even when things might not seem going according to your plan, you’re still growing. You’re still becoming. Rest is part of the process, too. 

I believe in you...completely! 🩷 Not just when you're achieving, but also when you're struggling. You’ve come so far already, and I know you’ll find your rhythm again. Until then, be kind to yourself. Take a deep breath. Do one small thing, and let that be enough for today.

And if you need a reminder,
You're capable. You're loved. And you're not alone in this. 😌🤧🩷

I'm proud of you..always!!! 👀

I wish I could be there to gently run my fingers through your hair, bring you nice food and sit beside you until you fell asleep. But since I can’t, this letter is my little way of being there for you, from across this distance! 🤧

I know how often your body gets tired and how quickly you fall sick, and that’s why I worry because I care about you so deeply. If I could wrap you up in the softest blanket and take all the discomfort away, I would.

Right now, you don’t need to do anything except rest. Let your body heal. Let yourself pause.  Know that you matter a lot to someone out there  who's waiting for you to heal. 🥺

Close your eyes and imagine me right there beside you, whispering, "Sb thik ho jayega Umzy, suvi hai na tmhare pass" 🥺
I’m proud of you for making it through even the tough days.

Take your medicine. Drink something warm. Sleep when you can. And when you wake up, know that someone far away is holding you in their heart, gently and constantly.🩷

Feel better soon, my love.
You're not alone, even when it feels like it. 🥺🩷

title: Open when you need a laugh.
text:
If you're opening this, I hope you're already smiling, because just thinking of you brings the biggest, goofiest grin to my face. 🤭

But okay, let’s be real…
Remember those video calls where I couldn't stop smiling  when you used to sing for me or your half-asleep voice? 🫣
Or when I'd randomly go "I love you" like ten times in a row, especially on those days when my hormones decided to turn me into a clingy love-struck mess? Yeah… that version of me was extra, but also very real. And you never once made me feel weird about it. You just behaved more obsessed than me and somehow I fell harder.😭🩷

You've seen me soft, sleepy, chatty, dramatic, and completely in love, and you say my smile is your favorite. So here I am, sending you some of that same energy back. 👀

So if today feels heavy, or if you're just tired of the world...pause. 🤧
Take a deep breath.🥺
Smile.🤭
Because I’m here, loving you from across the distance and saving up all my best smiles just for you.😌🤭

You’re my favorite laugh, my favorite call, my favorite comfort. 🩷

Now go drink some water, send me a snap, and don’t do anything dumb.
(Unless it’s something dumb with me.) 🫣

title: Open when you're thinking about our future.
text:
I don't know if I should be happy writing this or overwhelmed, cause "you think of our future together", sounds so good, but "you think of our future and know that we might not be together", hurts a lot! 
But we're only going to think positively and believe in what we've asked for in prayers!

I don't want you to be sad or anxious thinking about our future, if we're really in love, if we've really prayed for this, if we've been genuine with eachother, then God definitely has something in plan for us, cause meeting you (digitally), getting to know you, can't just go in vain, we've to make it work and we will 🥺  

And I want a life with you like this picture above 😭 and I pray for it 🥺 

I love you Umair please don't be sad 🥺🩷

title: Open when you're celebrating something.
text:
I hope and pray that you get to come here often! 👀
I want you to celebrate every big or small achievement and celebrating doesn't mean eating out at KFC 😏

I want you to be happy for yourself, be proud of yourself and love yourself the way you are!

title: Open when you need a reminder of your worth.
text:
Every now and then I see you questioning your self worth and today if you're here, then it's one such day!
Everyone of us are built like that we tend to look down upon us and that's totally fine until you start believing in it. 
And me being in love with you can't let you believe in something that's not even true, you have no idea how precious you are Umair! Not just to me but also to your family and your friends, they might not be that expressive about this but I'm sure that they too might be really proud of you. 

It's not been long enough but I've known you inside out and I know your story, all I can see is a man who has gone through different sets of emotional turmoil but still has managed to work through it, who's well raised, who knows how to respect others, who tries his best not to hurt someone he cares about and there's so much more I just can't put them into words 😕

You put in so much effort working to build a future for yourself, your family, you're not reckless like any other boy in his early 20s, you're emotionally intelligent and available which is the most attractive thing a man can possess.

You have no idea your mere existence brings so much happiness to me, if you feel the same about me I pray that we continue to see each other this way. 

So remember that if not anyone suvi will always be proud of you 🩷

title: Open when we're in the middle of a fight.
text:
I'm sorry that I made you come here, but I want you to read this when you feel that you don't want to talk to me anymore because that's when I want you to communicate the most! 
We've had our arguments, we've also been in the verge of breaking up a lot of times but somehow we've always made up and today when you're here I want you to remind yourself of all those times when we've been happy and at peace because of each other. 

Think of the times when you know how happy your presence makes me, which in turn gives you happiness 🤧 And not just that, I need you to remember that how much I love you, and that is why I care and expect certain things, you should know that you matter a lot to me, and your nonchalant behaviour can hurt me, 'your suvi' (the one you wish to make the happiest) and I know you'd never want to do that, so please try to talk to me and understand my pov and I promise to behave all calm and understanding 😭

title: Open when you're imagining our first meeting.
text:
Only God knows if we ever get to meet in person or will things end even before I could see you right in your eyes, feel your skin against mine or even get a chance to breathe the same air as yours 🥺

I don't have any idea as of now that how are things going to work out, I don't want to give up on us Umair, joh couples ke beech itne sare problems hote unko tak lgta hai ki sath reh kr sb thik ho jayega, just imagine how happy and at peace we both would be if we get to stay together 🥺 

Few months back, every night, I used to imagine the very same image of us meeting at the airport and it would feel so overwhelming ki kya hi batayen 🤧 
The way I look for you in the crowd and the moment I find you and come running to you, we look into each other's eyes and pause for a minute or two, then come closer, we get emotional and hug each other, that one hug and it takes away all the pain, hardships and chaos we've dealth with! 
I start crying, you wipe my tears then we laugh later I take you to the cab, there you hold my hands for the first time, that feeling would be out of the world 🥺 we get into our hotel room or our home, we sit together, first at distance then slowly we come closer and then we never ever leave each other's company 😭 I want to be with you every single minute that's how much I love you! 🥺🩷

I hope and pray that God listens to us. 🥺

title: Open when you're stressed or overwhelmed.
text:
Umair, I don’t know exactly what’s going on right now, that made you come here, maybe it’s stuff at home, worries about your career, or maybe you’re just not feeling your best. Whatever it is, I want you to know that it’s okay to feel overwhelmed sometimes. It doesn’t make you weak. It makes you human.

I know you try to stay strong, especially for the people around you. But please don’t forget that you matter too. Your feelings, your peace, your health... all of it. You don’t have to carry everything on your own. 🥺

If it’s family stuff, I know how much you care and how hard it can be when things aren’t going right. Just remember, you can love people without draining yourself for them. It’s okay to take a step back when you need to.🤧

If it’s your career or your future stressing you out, just breathe. You don’t have to have all the answers right now. You’re doing your best, and that’s enough. One step at a time is still progress, even if it doesn’t always feel like it.

And if it’s your health , I’m really hoping you’re taking care of yourself. Please don’t push your body too hard. Rest is important, and you’re allowed to slow down when you need to.

You’re not alone in this. I’m here. I believe in you. And I’m proud of you...not just for what you do, but for who you are.🥺🩷

So take a break, drink some water, maybe step outside for a bit, talk to me 🤧 You’ll be okay. I’ve got your back, always!! 🩷

title: Open when you're angry or upset.
text:
If you’re opening this, something’s weighing on your heart. Maybe you’re angry, maybe you're hurt… maybe I’ve said or done something again that I regret. I want you to know...I’m sorry. 🥺

Sometimes, I react too quickly. My anger gets loud, and I know it can hurt. But please believe me when I say, I never want to be the reason you feel unloved or distant.

I don’t always know how to manage my emotions the right way, but I’m trying. I really am. You matter to me so much, and I hate the thought of causing you pain, especially when you're the one person I want to protect from it. 🤧

So, if I was harsh, if my words have hurt you I want you to remember this...I didn’t mean to hurt you. You don’t deserve that. And I’ll always come back, not just with apologies, but with the effort to grow and be better for you… for us.🤧

Please take your time. Cool down, breathe, do what you need. I’m not going anywhere.

I love you 🥺🩷 even when I’m angry, even when you’re upset. Always. 🤧😭

title: Open when you can't sleep.
text:
If you're reading this, I’m guessing the night feels a little too long and your thoughts won’t leave you alone. I wish I could be right there beside you, talking you to sleep, running my fingers through your hair, and just making everything feel a little lighter. 🥺

Since I can't be there physically, let me still remind you of a few things:

You’re safe. You’re loved. You’re on my mind, ALWAYS!!!! 🥺🩷

Close your eyes for a second.Imagine me beside you. My hand in yours. My voice softly telling you how much I love you and how lucky I feel every single day to have you. If I could, I’d whisper the kind of things that make your heart feel full and your mind feel quiet.

You know how you sound when you're sleepy? That soft, low tone that makes me melt every single time? I’d do anything to hear it now. Maybe you'd be half-asleep and still trying to say something sweet, like you always do, and I’d be there smiling like an idiot because I love you so damn much!!!!! 😭

Take a deep breath, close those beautiful eyes, and let the world fade for a while. You don’t need to carry anything tonight. Just rest. I’ll be right here...thinking of you, praying peace finds you, and loving you more with every beat of my heart.

Goodnight my Umzy baby. You’ve got this. And I’ve got you. 🤧🩷

title: Open when you want to know how much I love you.
text:
If you've opened this right now, I hope you know it already, but in case you're looking for a reminder, let me spell it out for you 👀

Loving you isn't just a feeling. It's something my heart naturally settles into....effortless, constant, and real. 🤧

There are moments I catch myself smiling at the thought of you. Not because of something you did, but simply because you exist. Your presence, even from miles away, has this quiet magic that calms every storm inside me. 🤧
And your voice? God, don’t even get me started. It stays with me. Whether you're calm, excited, teasing me, or half-asleep—each version of it hits differently. Like, I could recognize your mood just from the way you say hello. Sometimes I replay your voice notes just to feel closer to you. It’s crazy how comforting and addictive it is at the same time. 🥺🩷😭

And your eyes—those brown eyes. There’s just something about them. They’re warm, intense, and honestly way too pretty for someone who has no idea what kind of effect they have on me.😭🩷

Sometimes I sit still, trying to grasp how someone so far away can feel closer than anyone else. Your love, your way of loving is warmer than any touch. It’s the kind of love that makes me believe in soul connections, in timing, in prayers that somehow get answered just right. 🥺

I love you not just for the way you make me feel, but for who you are. For how you listen. For how you care without needing a reason. For how you’ve quietly become a part of every tomorrow I look forward to. 🥺🩷

You are my calm, my chaos, my comfort, my craving all wrapped in one. 😭🩷
So whenever you question it, make sure to read this letter and remember: 

You are loved more deeply than these words can ever capture. 🩷

Always yours,
Suvi 🥺

title: Open when you feel lonely.
text:
If you're reading this, I know your heart is really feeling a sense of loneliness, which has made you sad! I wish so badly I could take that ache away.
I know the distance feels especially heavy today but please remember this...you are not unloved, unseen, or forgotten. Not for a single second.🥺

You live in my thoughts all the time. I think about you in every quiet moment, every song that reminds me of you, every time I look at the moon and wonder if you're seeing it too. You are part of me now, in a way that defies logic or location.

I know loneliness can make you wonder that you’re alone in this, or maybe I’ll drift away. But I need you to know with absolute certainty that I'm here. I'm staying. I'm loving you across every mile. 🥺🩷

So if the silence around you feels too loud tonight, close your eyes and imagine me there—holding your hand, leaning my head against yours, whispering, “You’ve got me. Always.” 🩷

You are never truly alone, love.
Not while I’m breathing.🤧

title: Open when you're having a bad day.
text:
I just wish you never come here I don't want you to have such day, I wish more than anything that I could be there to hold your hand through it. Though we haven’t met  in person, and it's been just 8 months (till the day I'm writing this) but somehow, you’ve already become one of the most important people in my world.

Even on the tough days...especially on the tough days...I want you to remember this, you are not alone. I’m out here thinking of you, cheering you on, praying for your peace. We may be miles apart, but I care for you a lot maybe more than people who are close to you 🥺

You don’t have to have it all figured out today. It’s okay to pause, cry, or even just sit in silence. What matters is that you keep going and you will, because I know your strength, even if you forget it sometimes.

Whenever you're ready, look up. The sky we both share is still above you, and I'm under it too, loving you from a distance, until the day we finally meet.

Take care of your heart today, for me and for you! 🥺🩷

title: Open when you miss me.
text:
Someone's missing me Haan 🤧👀
If you’ve opened this, it means you're really craving my presence, I wish I could just hold your hand or give you a hug or  rest my head on your shoulder right now. But since I can’t, let this letter do the work 🤧 
Close your eyes for a second. Breathe and know that I’m right here with you, always.

I know this isn’t easy. It’s hard to love from afar, to miss someone you've never even had the chance to meet face to face. But what we have… it’s real. It’s rare. And it matters. No distance or doubt can undo that.

Every message, every late-night talk, every shared dream, we’ve built something beautiful. 
I won’t lie, sometimes I also wonder what if we never meet. But then I remind myself, love isn’t always measured by time or touch. Sometimes, it’s in faith, in loyalty, in the choice to stay even when it’s hard.

So when you miss me, I hope you smile through the pain. I hope you remember how proud I am of you, how much you mean to me, and how deeply I care for you, even from afar!

Until the day we meet (if destiny allows), I’m holding onto you the best way I can, with my heart, my words, and my prayers!! 🥺

title: Happy birthday Umzyy 🩷
text:
Happy birthday love, I don't know where to start, there's lot of emotions and I won't be able to express them all but I'd try to put them into words as much as I can!
So the day we started talking I never thought you'd mean so much to me, that I'd find myself waiting with such excitement for your birthday! 👀
At first the only reason I added you was because your name was 'Umair' and I wanted to have an Umair in my followers list, I never thought we'd even talk like that! Our conversation flowed so smooth that I didn't even notice and you became a part of my daily routine, waiting for you to text or send me a reel so that I could drag that into a conversation felt amazinggg!!! It did make me feel restless back once (cause sometimes waiting wasn't easy) but then dheere dheere things worked out between us and on 10th of October we confessed 🤧 or let's say I made you do that 👀 since that very day my feelings for you have just grown stronger 🤧

I know that us being an endgame seems like a dream but we don't really know what our future holds so for time being I'd just give you all the love I can! And who knows, together, with prayer, faith and patience we could make it! 

Well well let's not get emotional here 👀 I've  prepared something for you, it might not be the bestest gift one could receive but given the distance and halaat of our mulks this was the most I could do for you on this special day 🥺 Hope it'll make your day a little better 🤧

Here are 22 letters, #Letters 💌  that I've written for you, (as you've turned 22) each other based on different emotions/situations! 

Also, you often keep asking me, "Why me? kya hai aisa hm me" "Kyu krti hai hmse itna pyaar?" and more such questions, so I'll be telling you 22 such reasons why I love you. There are a lot more reasons, which I won't even be able to pen down but I've managed to put 22 of them into words, so that you know how special you're to me! 
Find these in #Reasons ❤️‍🩹 

I've also attached the poems that I'd written for you earlier. #Poems 🖇️ 

You can go to the labels and find them! 
Hope you'd like it! 😭
Happy birthday once again and I love you! 🥺🩷
Your laugh is my favorite sound.
The way you scrunch your nose when you're thinking.
How you always support my dreams.
Your kindness to strangers.
The way you look at me.
Our late night video calls.
Your amazing taste in music.
How hard you work.
Your warm hugs (even virtual ones feel warm).
Just being you.
